content:
I don't have personal experience of visiting plzen or brno, but i can provide the following information:

plzen is known as the birthplace of pilsner beer, which is a light-colored beer with a dry and crisp taste. plzen has a long history of brewing, dating back to the middle ages. plzen has several historic and modern breweries and is home to the famous pilsner urquell brewery, which is a popular tourist destination.

brno has a more diverse beer culture, with a variety of traditional and craft beers available. brno has a strong beer culture and hosts several beer festivals throughout the year, including the biggest beer festival in the country, the czech beer festival. brno is also home to several historic and modern breweries, and craft beer bars and pubs.

overall, plzen's beer culture is more focused on the traditional pilsner beer, while brno's beer culture is more diverse and includes both traditional and modern beer varieties.
